meanings.definition: The quality of being showy or flashy in a superficial way.
meanings.sent1: The glitziness of her outfit caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The glitziness of the decorations made the event feel special.
meanings.sent3: The glitziness of the costume made her look like a walking disco ball.
meanings.sent4: The glitziness of the jewelry sparkled like a thousand tiny stars.
meanings.sent5: The glitziness of the show left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The state of being characterized by an excessive display of glamour or extravagance.
meanings.sent1: The glitziness of the event was overwhelming with its bright lights and fancy decorations.
meanings.sent2: Her glitziness in dressing up for the gala was unmatched by anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The glitziness of the party made it feel like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent4: The glitziness of the celebrity's lifestyle was a facade hiding the true person within.
meanings.sent5: The glitziness of the ballroom transported guests to a world of luxury and opulence.
